term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - constitutional repeating unit (CRU) in polymers
term.title: constitutional repeating unit

item.text: The smallest constitutional unit the repetition of which constitutes a regular macromolecule, a regular oligomer molecule, a regular block or a regular chain.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2291 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
